content: Great overview, thank you for sharing. I’m quite suprised no real discussion of S&P performance. The VC market froze in response to S&P having a horrible start to 2016 and had the S&P continued to drift down it’s hard to imagine the VC market wouldn’t have had a prolonged “Winter” in such scenario. To a lot of people it might seem as though VC GPs and LPs were merely bailed out by constructive public markets. What do you all think?
